name: Zong
summary: Your initial location will be the Cave of Centiwell, where you get to meet one of the Supreme Commanders in the current era of Anima Gravis. The Commander will talk to you about the hardships Zong is going through and what your mission would be. In the 2nd level, at the exit of Centiwell, you will be standing on a battlefield, facing Boreas Gorge. The Osteospectral Tiger whose skin is transparent has sensed your smell coming from human earth and would come to your life, would you survive?
